attributes.action: More Competition on the belfast- Heathrow route
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the demise of BA from Northern Ireland- It has left just one UK carrier to monopolise the Belfast London Heathrow Route - Please vote to see more competition on this route - offering fair minded, paying passengers more low cost fares Apparently it's one of their most profitable routes.... Now come on one of the other big players lets see some competetion.
